children.text: Himachal Hues from Rest of India  Summer Special
Arrive In New Delhi by flight (From Bangalore, Chennai, Pune, Ahmedabad, Hyderabad)

Board your flight on time to New Delhi. (Please report at the airport minimum 1 ½ hrs prior to flight departure time).

Meet MakeMyTrip representative upon arrival at the airport & check into your hotel.

Afternoon: Proceed for a half-day sightseeing of New Delhi. Visit the famous Qutub Minar, Lotus Temple (closed on Mondays) & India Gate.

Evening: Return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

After an early breakfast, drive to Shimla from Delhi. Shimla, a very popular holiday-retreat is well-known for its Victorian architecture, which is reflected in certain areas of the Mall and The Ridge. It is also a famous holiday spot for honeymoon.

Enroute visit Pinjore Gardens.

Upon arrival at Shimla, check in at the hotel.

After breakfast at the hotel, proceed for a half day excursion to Kufri (2500mts). Visit Indira Bungalow & the Himalayan Zoo. You can also take a hike or a take a Pony up to Mashu Peak. 

Afternoon: Guests will be dropped at the Shimla Mall road to explore by themselves. Attractions of the mall road include Shimla Church, Scandal Point, Gaiety Theatre, Town hall & shopping.

Evening, the guests shall be transferred to their respective hotels for overnight stay. Dinner shall be at the hotel.

Note: Pony ride at Kufri are on direct payment basis.

After breakfast at hotel, depart for Manali. Drive past Beas-Sutlej Link project, Pandoh Dam & Kullu Valley.  Lunch shall be en-route on direct payment basis.

Check in to your hotel on arrival for an overnight stay.

After breakfast, we will take you to Adventure Camp .Enjoy adventure activities like river crossing, rappelling, Archery, rifle shooting and Burma Bridge at the camp. (Only for Deluxe, Premium & Luxury)

Complimentary lunch shall be served at the camp site. (Only for Deluxe, Premium & Luxury)

Post lunch; proceed for a half day sightseeing of Manali. Visit Vashishtha Kund & Hidimba Temple. 

Stay overnight at the hotel in Manali.

Early morning, take a half day excursion to Rohtang Snow Point. (Closed on Tuesday).  

On return, visit Solang Valley. You can opt for adventure sports like Para Gliding, Zorbing, and Skiing (subject to snow) on direct payment basis.

Return to Manali. Stay overnight at the hotel in Manali.
After breakfast at the hotel, drive to Chandigarh. Upon arrival, check in to the hotel. Relax, enjoy dinner and an overnight stay at the hotel.
After breakfast, transfer to New Delhi airport to board flight to your onward destination.
Per person rates (in Rs.) - applicable on 2 persons staying together sharing the same room
Transportation shall be on sharing basis & as per itinerary only (not available at disposal)
The package does not include guide services. These can be availed at an additional cost
Package rates are subject to change without prior notice
Meal plan: EP - Accommodation only, CP - Accommodation with breakfast, MAP - Accommodation with breakfast, lunch or dinner, AP – Accommodation with breakfast, lunch and dinner
The package cannot be combined with any other offer
Refund on cancellation depends upon concerned hotel's cancellation policy
The above package is not valid during national holidays, festivals, long weekends and New Year
MakeMyTrip India (Pvt) Ltd reserves the right to change/modify or terminate the offer any time at its own discretion and without any prior notice
Any expenses caused by reasons beyond our control such as flight delays, rescheduling or cancellations, any accidents, medical evacuations, riots, strikes, etc. need to be borne by the guests
Prior to 45 days or more - 40% of tour cost
Between 44 and 31 days of departure - 50% of tour cost
Between 30 and 11 days of departure - 75% of tour cost
10 days prior to date of departure - 100%
